name: Striker .44 Magnum
description: Adds a revolver to the game, either replacing the striker or as an add-on

english.ui_firearms_hero_revolver_44magnum_desc: U.S. made revolver chambered in .44 Magnum. Low rate of fire with very high damage.

options.name: Animated
options.tooltip: Use animated reload/firing. May occasionally break parts of the model.

options.name: Static
options.tooltip: Static model, no animations for reloads or firing.

options.name: Replace Striker
options.tooltip: Replaces the striker with the revolver

options.name: Replace El matador
options.tooltip: Replaces El matador with the revolver

options.name: Add-On
options.tooltip: Adds the revolver as a new item
